titles.title: 1921 Silver Dollar Coin Anniversary Act
1921 Silver Dollar Coin Anniversary Act

A bill to require the Secretary of the Treasury to honor the 100th anniversary of completion of coinage of the "Morgan Dollar" and the 100th anniversary of commencement of coinage of the "Peace Dollar", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
1921 Silver Dollar Coin Anniversary Act
The Department of the Treasury shall mint and issue $1 silver coins in recognition of the 100th anniversary of completion of coinage of the Morgan dollar and the 100th anniversary of commencement of coinage of the Peace dollar.
Treasury may issue such coins beginning on January 1, 2021.
